devdoc.details: The contract is interacted with priceResolver.solCustom price gateway is allowed, but need to implement priceGateway.sol and set by governAccountSystem implemented price gateway since it will handle set price by govern

addPriceGateway(address).details: This function must be called by govern, will logic occur in internal function

params.priceGateway: price Gateway address that want to whitelist

assetPrice(address,address,uint256).details: accept ETH / USD as Asset / Base Token

params.amount: Asset Amount in term of Asset decimal

isSupportedPair(address,address).details: This function not really check in gateway,since the checking will be done when setting tokenPairPriceGatewayMap

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

setTokenPairPriceGatewayMap(address[],ad.details: This function must be called by govern, will logic occur in internal function

params._assets: Asset List that supported by price gateway
params._bases: Base token List that supported by price gateway

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

devdoc.title: Dao Account System

addPriceGateway(address).notice: Add the price gateway to whitelist

isSupportedPair(address,address).notice: Check the token pair is support or not

setTokenPairPriceGatewayMap(address[],ad.notice: Set the price gateway which will handle the pairs of price

userdoc.notice: This contract helps managing price gateway and allow set price by govern
